testcase.name: Register a new valid user
testcase.system-out: Given The user launched the Application.....................................passed When The user navigates to the Register page................................passed And The user registers new User Successfully................................passed And The User Registered Successfully........................................passed And The user clicks on continue button......................................passed When The user navigates to the Login page...................................passed And The User enters login credentials.......................................passed Then The user logged in successfully........................................passed When The user searches about Product as "Windows 8 Pro".....................passed And The user selects the search suggestion no "1"...........................passed And The user adds the "Windows 8 Pro" in the cart...........................passed And The user complete Checkout for "1"......................................passed
